creditline: Gift of funds from Lucy Crosby Mitchell
medium: Natural dyed wool yarns and aniline dyed wool yarns, wedgeweave technique
text: Rectangular woven wool rug with dark brown tassels at each corner; zig ziag or triangular wedge shape design in primarily shades of red and black with some lemon and mustard yellow lines; rug is puckered to give it a three-dimensional quality; several black fabric bolsters below rug for padding and support.
title: Spiritual Flames
